1.content:
You approach the wooden door of a rather large mansion, after the hike up the lengthy driveway you are already slightly winded.
"this place really is in the middle of nowhere" you say to yourself "I hope this guy isn't some crazy old weirdo"
you raise your hand to knock but before you can lay a knuckle on the door it opens up. behind it stands young girl with dark black hair pulled into a ponytail and still wet from a shower. shes adorned in nothing but a purple tank top and sweatpants that bag around her ankles, her bare feet poking out from under the fabric. She looks up at you with bright green eyes, seeming slightly impatient she asks "can i help you...?"
1.title: The New Job

12.content:
"My name is Christopher white, im here about a job interview for the position of assistant housekeeper" you smile kindly.
She returns a faint smile "guess some people still do read the newspaper after all." she gestures inside "My name is Anya by the way, will you come in? its far to bright outside."
you step into the house, its slightly dark but everything is perfectly visible. This is a greeting area there are couches and a table in the middle, the walls are adorned with fine knickknacks and a few mysterious objects who's purpose you cant begin to fathom. You figure you should say something to break the ice.
12.title: "My name is Christopher white..."

choices: "Sorry if you look like a 12 year old kid..."
121.content:
she narrows her eyes harshly and furrows her brows. "im sorry? what was that?" she appears agitated by the question. "im not as young as i look Mr. White..."
You decide she is definitely offended, you respond...
121.title: "Are your parents home?"

1211.content:
She goes beyond agitated in the blink of an eye, her eyes flash in disbelief for a second before returning to cold narrow slits. "wait right there..." she says softly before walking around the corner, she returns a moment later holding a large leather bound book in one hand. "tell me... Chris. do you know what kind of assisting you were going to be doing in my mansion?"

you shake your head nervously

"You were going to be a witches assistant, MY assistant. I have no need for rude assistants but maybe I have another position for you to fill...
tell me what made you think i was only a child?"

"this girl is nuts" you think "a witch? ya ok"
you answer her question... "i thought you were a child because..."
1211.title: "Sorry if you look like a 12 year old kid.....

choices: "Stop running your mouth an help me"
12111.content:
As if she couldn't get any madder, her pale face reddens as she examines her small breasts. "oh i see" she snarls "you think women should be curvy? then i have the perfect place for you..." she looks down at the book she is holding and mutters something under her breath.
you feel kinda tingly all the sudden, like your arm is falling asleep or something except the feeling has spread all over your body.
"whats happening to me?!" you begin to panic, you go to take a step but your leg wobbles and you fall. you try to recover but your body is no longer responding to your commands.
you look up to see the girl standing above you, she places her bare foot on top of your chest and smiles triumphantly. "I hope you enjoyed casting insults at my body, you are going to be spending alot of time with it from now on."
you need to say something quick...
12111.title: "Your flat body obviously"

choices: i guess i don't have a choice...

"no talking" she says with a pant "your tongue only has one use right now" she reaches back and pulls her underwear down revealing her small tight asshole nestled between her cheeks. "you can use that tongue to please me, and if you do well i might show you some mercy"
121111.title: A poor choice of words

She does more than just show you

"No way!" you say as best you can from beneath her petite form, unwilling to please someone that is treating you like this. But, little did you know, is that it was a grave mistake to deny her command as you are about to learn what she is truly capable of...

1211111.title: Not a chance

122.content:
"oh? eager to get started are we? very well i can walk you through some of the responsibilities you will need to keep up with if you like"
Anya reaches in her pocket and pulls out a list "lets see here... what should we go over first?"
122.title: "so about this job"

info.brief_description: A shrinking/vore story that puts you in the place of a young witches new assistant.
info.description:
Hey everybody just a few things before we begin but i'll keep this brief.

1.) This is a vore story! people will be eaten inserted and otherwise ingested, if any of that makes you uncomfortable please leave.
2.) 18+ only. this was intended for mature audiences
3.) Anyone can contribute! please use proper grammar and spelling (im not going to scold you for minor issues but please use good judgement)
4.)There is no hard vore (chewing, dismemberment, crushing ect.) Allowed. sorry not my thing.
5.) Graphic digestion is allowed but use blood gently
6.) This story contains magic so you can get creative (do not change the subject matter however)
7.) This is an interactive story don't make links like (she ate you) leave a little bit of surprise for the reader.
8.) I reserve the right to remove unsuitable links without warning, I also reserve the right to add new rules as they are needed.

Thank you for reading and contributing, enjoy the show!
